abstract.text: The Subscriber class manages the subscription to audio and video tracks from the Millicast platform.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive connection state changes for the peer
connection.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive http errors
Get a Combine based publisher that receives rts remote tracks when they are available.
Get a Combine based publisher that receives  publisher stream stopped events
List all available rts remote audio tracks received so far.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives connection state changes for the websocket connection.
Create a webrtc remote track that can be used for advanced projection use cases
Get the current viewer’s credentials.
Asynchronously query whether the subscriber is connected or not.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives rts remote tracks when they are available.
The Subscriber class manages the subscription to audio and video tracks from the Millicast platform.
The Client base that contains common methods between
and
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives connection state changes for the peer connection.
Sets the credentials, providing authentication information required for connecting to the streaming platform.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives stream stopped events
The Publisher interface is responsible for publishing media to a Millicast stream.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive connection state changes for the websocket
connection.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives subscriber stats updates.
Asynchronously query the currently set credentials.
Create an AsyncStream that receives http connection errors.
Stops the subscription process indicating to the streaming server that the subscriber
is no longer interested in receiving audio and video content.
After calling this method, the SDK automatically terminates the connection between
the subscriber and the streaming platform.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive stats reports.
Connects and opens a websocket connection with the Millicast platform.  You must set valid credentials before using this method.
Create an AsyncStream that receives signaling errors.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive signaling errors
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive subscriber stats events
List all available webrtc remote video tracks created so far.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives viewer count updates.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive viewer count events
Subscribes to a stream with options.
Asynchronously query whether the subscriber is currently subscribed to a stream or not.
List all available rts remote video tracks received so far.
List all available webrtc remote audio tracks created so far.
Initialize a subscriber.
Checks whether the subscriber is currently subscribing to any media.
Initiates the subscription process from the Millicast platform.
Prior to calling this method, you must use the
or similar to
connect the subscriber to the platform.
Successful subscription results in calling the onSubscribed method of the Listener.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives stats reports.
